titles.title: Because of you I can dance

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Never before have i felt so alive
Never before have i thought i could fly
Never before have i ever been so free
'Cause being with you i now begin to see

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Because of you i can dance
Because of you i lift my hands
Because of you i can sing
I am free

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
We're jumping
Shouting, dancing
Spinning, singing
There's freedom
